.class public interface auto ansi abstract IConventionIndexBuilder implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.IConventionAnnotatableBuilder

summary.para: Provides a simple API surface for configuring an from conventions.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions for more information and examples.

Docs.param: A set of values indicating whether each corresponding index column has descending sort order.
Indicates whether the configuration was specified using a data annotation.
Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this index sort order can be configured from the current configuration source.
Docs.returns: if the index uniqueness can be configured.
